class.name: VisualShaderNodeUIntParameter
class.brief_description: A visual shader node for shader parameter (uniform) of type unsigned [int].
class.description: A [VisualShaderNodeParameter] of type unsigned [int]. Offers additional customization for range of accepted values.

members.member: Default value of this parameter, which will be used if not set externally. [member default_value_enabled] must be enabled; defaults to [code]0[/code] otherwise.
If [code]true[/code], the node will have a custom default value.
